summary: An exhausted concert pianist learns he is the owner of an apartment building; after being advised to move there to rest, he becomes involved in the lives of his eccentric tenants.
cast: David Niven|Jane Wyman|Victor Moore|Wayne Morris|Broderick Crawford|Joseph Buloff|Maria Ouspenskaya|Curt Bois|Percival Vivian|Raymond Greenleaf|John Alvin|Janet Barrett|Howard Brody|Geraldine Carr|Phyllis Coates|Frank Dae|Joe Devlin|Dickie Dillon|Jimmie Dodd|Paul Dunn|William Edmunds|Parker Eggleston|Paulette Evans|Franklyn Farnum|Creighton Hale|Grayce Hampton|Betty Hill|Stuart Holmes|Tiny Jones|Charles Jordan|Douglas Kennedy|Donald Kerr|Blayney Lewis|Fred Marlow|Frank Marlowe|Claire Meade|Bess Meyers|Jerry Mickelsen|Ray Montgomery|Jack Mower|Joel Nestler|Norman Ollestad|Paul Panzer|Larry Rio|David Sandell|Sailor Vincent|Lottie Williams|Tom Wilson|Jack Wise|Raymond ZeBrack
title: A Kiss in the Dark
